MAIN_MESSAGE: We apologise that today's pre arranged work affecting your property in the L20 postcode area of Bootle is still ongoing. This is due to a late start to the planned work and we now expect power to be back on by 6pm.  We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3.20pm on April 29, 2021.
